thread.title: Cher files for conservatorship of son Elijah Blue Allman, citing alleged substance abuse
thread.title_full: Cher files for conservatorship of son Elijah Blue Allman, citing alleged substance abuse

author: Carlos De Loera - Los Angeles Times (TNS)
title: Cher files for conservatorship of son Elijah Blue Allman, citing alleged substance abuse
text:
Cher is looking to take over the finances of her son Elijah Blue Allman by filing for a conservatorship.
The Grammy-winning artist alleges that Allman, 47, is "substantially unable to manage his own financial resources due to severe mental health and substance abuse issues," as noted in court documents filed Wednesday, per TMZ.
